imdb.title: Monster Farm: Enbanseki no himitsu
imdb.plot: Genki is a young teen boy who gets zapped into an alternate world called Monster Rancher (Monster Farm in the Japanese version) where he must stop the evil Moo which can only be done by reviving the Phoenix, along his journey he b...

episodes.title: Return to Monster Rancher
episodes.plot: A year has passed since the final battle with Moo, but Genki still cannot forget his friends. Suddenly he is led by an image of Mocchi to a deserted shop with a Monster Rancher game disc. Playing the disc he sees his friends' quest to defeat Moo unfold before him and what happened in his absence.

episodes.title: In Quest for the Legend Cup
episodes.plot: Holly is determined to free her father from the Disc and trap Moo inside. The three enter a city to eat and while they are there, they see Poritoka and Most in the Legend Cup competition.

episodes.title: Battle for the Rookie Cup
episodes.plot: Genki and Mocchi take part in the first of six competition that leads to the Legend Cup.

episodes.title: Saved by a Hare
episodes.plot: The gang runs into Hare at an orchard and finds out that he has been living with Tama who saved Hare after the battle with Moo.

episodes.title: The Powerful Wondar Brothers
episodes.plot: While Mocchi is searching for food, he chances upon the Wonder Brothers.

episodes.title: Tiger and the Mandy Cup Challenge
episodes.plot: Tiger wants to make his debut at the Mandy Cup, but everyone is worried that he won't be able to as he has forgotten his abilities. Genki tries to teach Tiger some defensive moves but Tiger insists to continue practicing alone to recover his lost abilities.

episodes.title: Disappearing Hare Line
episodes.plot: The gang becomes increasingly curious about Hare's baggage but Hare refuses to show them. But then when a small Dinosaur steals his baggage the gang gives chase and finds that the Dinosaur is an orphan living under the care of Fairy Hare, one of Hare's long lost friends.

episodes.title: Lost at Sea: The Disappearance of the Mystery Disc
episodes.plot: Fed up with their failures, General Durahan sends out his Shelly Gabus to deal with the gang. The Gabus caught up with the gang who found themselves on a deserted sea platform.

episodes.title: Furred Suezo's M-1 Grand Prix Hero
episodes.plot: In this competition (3 rounds, 1 on 1), Mocchi must enter with two other monsters in the list that is designated by the IMA. Only Golem and Suezo qualify. While Golem is fine, Suezo is terrified.

episodes.title: All's Fare in Love and Taxis
episodes.plot: The gang tries to cross the marshlands but have problems with getting a cheap taxi. In the end they took Sandra's offer of 700 gold.

episodes.title: Allan's Advice
episodes.plot: In the forest, Genki is busy with creating battle plans when Wood Golem attacks. No one listens to Genki's battle plans and Genki, Mocchi and Wood Golem falls into the river. When Genki awakens he finds Allan, who goes around searching for and unlocking Discs.

episodes.title: Winner's Cup: The Fickle Finger of Fate
episodes.plot: In the Winner's Cup held in a town by the seaside, Mocchi's partner has to be Golem who is the only 1 in the 5 IMA designated monsters that is with the gang. It will be 2 rounds of 1 on 1 battles and a Sudden Death in the event of a tie against the defending champions. While Golem is bend on making up for his mistakes the other time, Mocchi isn't feeling well at all and faints from high fever.

episodes.title: Pink Jam to the Rescue
episodes.plot: Pink Jam and the gels have changed their ways but are still failures in whatever they do. Incidentally, the gang meets up with them but they don't realize it as they concealed their baddies' crest. Just as things where going well, a fearsome trio of Jokers attacked! Can Pink Jam do anything about it and can these ex-Baddies be trusted?

episodes.title: Ghost Encounters of the Pirate Kind
episodes.plot: The gang meets up with Horn who lost his pirate ship mysteriously one night! Also, they hear about the legend of a phantom ship in these parts of the ocean. So they decided to help find Horn's ship. Surely, they found the ship alright but it is anything but empty!

episodes.title: The World Monster Cup - Naga Returns
episodes.plot: When Mum Mew asks about his plans, General Durahan says that he has already found a very strong monster who can deal with the gang. As they signed up for the World Monster Cup, the gang realized that they don't have a partner for Mocchi that is in IMA's designated list so they went around only to encounter Naga of the Big Bad Four.

episodes.title: Legend of the Great White Most
episodes.plot: Mum Mew and Gobi decides to personally deal with the gang and spare the General's monster collection. The gang enters a training village and splits up to go to their respective type designated region to train.

episodes.title: Shogun, the Mighty
episodes.plot: General Durahan's collection, there is a fearsome warrior - Shogun who is stronger than General Durahan himself.

episodes.title: Brothers, in the Greatest Four
episodes.plot: Tiger meets up with Grey Wolf but refuses to acknowledge him as his brother after realizing that they are opponent in battle.

episodes.title: Golem's Cook-Off
episodes.plot: Golem and gang runs into an Old Lady who cooks the best Pizza. Just when she was about to defend her crown in the cooking competition, her secret sauce is stolen.

episodes.title: Battling Granity
episodes.plot: The gang meets up with Granity but then she becomes controlled by a machine type Baddie that enters her head.

episodes.title: Mum Mew Risks It All
episodes.plot: Mum Mew, Gobi and Weed tries to capture the gang by issuing wanted posters.

episodes.title: Legend Cup: Mocchi vs Poritoka
episodes.plot: Genki and the gang made it to the International Monster Association headquarters to register for the Legend Cup.

episodes.title: Legend Cup: Mocchi vs Most
episodes.plot: General Durahan orders Mew and Gobi to show him the highlights of the Legend Cup thus far. Meanwhile, Most's public sparring match is held to raise funds for a gymnasium for young boys and girls as well as monsters that intend to participate in future monster battles.

episodes.title: Reunion
episodes.plot: Despite losing to Most, Most gladly destroys the championship belt to give the Magic Stone to the gang. Armed with the Magic Stone, the gang sets off in Most's plane to find a shrine to unlock the Mystery Disc and seal Moo forever.

episodes.title: The Final Battle
episodes.plot: After rescuing Holly's father, the gang waits for him to awaken. Then, the Mystery Disc gets stolen by General Durahan.

episodes.title: Tiger's Battle with Destiny
episodes.plot: Gray Wolf challenges his brother, Tiger of the Wind, to a one to one duel to settle things. Who will be the victor?

episodes.title: Color Pandora, Guardian of the Forest
episodes.plot: Genki and the group enter Naga's territory, which is also the Color Pandoras' forests. Naga sends Stone Dragon to destroy them. Meanwhile, the group falls into one of the Color Pandora's traps. They eventually understand each other, and work together to trap Stone Dragon. But when Stone Dragon breaks free, Color Pandora then turns him into a Lost Disc...

episodes.title: Farewell, My Friend
episodes.plot: Genki and the group meet up with Jim and his Eared Mew at the Yellow River. They battle Baddies as they cross the river. Genki is angry at Jim, who thinks that he is just a kid, but sees that Genki is a strong person when he saves him.

episodes.title: Baby Bossy
episodes.plot: Genki and the gang resurrect Bossy. The Apes worship Bossy, because he finds them food and shelter. But the Rock Apes steal him for the same purposes, and Genki's gang collaborates so both tribes are equal among Bossy's rule.

episodes.title: Amusement Park Ruins
episodes.plot: Genki and the gang locate an abandoned amusement park that is the remain of an ancient civilization. They all explore, until the Kuros kidnap Mocchi. They beat the Kuros, but Pixie comes to tell them that Moo found his body.

episodes.title: Holly's Million-Gold Smile
episodes.plot: The gang meets up with Niton, a snail-like creature who is a merchant. He sells them second-rate quality items and a fake mystery disc for Holly's dagger. Infuriated, they go to find him, but the Jells trap them on the beach and bury them. But the tide is coming in fast. Holly begs Niton to help, and he finally comes to his senses and does what is right. He digs them out and gives them a refund.

episodes.title: Battle in the Meadow
episodes.plot: Naga sends the Tainted Cat Brothers to destroy Genki and his friends. Mocchi and Genki are separated from the group, and meet with the Tainted Cat Brothers' old mentor, Kato. Kato trains Genki and Mocchi, and together the two help the Tainted Cat Brothers realize that they were wrong to turn against their mentor.

episodes.title: The Town That Disappeared
episodes.plot: Naga sends his most powerful warrior, Bajarl, to destroy Genki and the others. Bajarl traps them in his jar, and only Holly and Mocchi escape. Holly then stumbles onto a ghost town that was wiped out by Bajarl. Holly reads the mayor's diary, realizing that the mayor rigged a huge rock formation above the town with explosives. She blows up the rock, trapping Bajarl and saving her friends.

episodes.title: Battle with the Big Bad Four
episodes.plot: The gang infiltrates Naga's headquarters to take out the last of the Big Bad four!

episodes.title: Eve's Night
episodes.plot: Moo is finally merged with his body and immediately seeks out Genki's group. They are currently traveling over a mountain, and they come across a sleepy village. The village doesn't answer when they ask to stay in, because it is "Ogre Day" in the village, where an ogre comes and steals children...

episodes.title: Holly's Happy Birthday
episodes.plot: Genki and the monsters celebrate Holly's birthday.

episodes.title: Evil General Durahan's Challenge
episodes.plot: Moo orders General Durahan to destroy Genki and his group. Durahan sends End Bringer, who is stronger than the group. But the group's courage fuels them to destroy End Bringer.

episodes.title: Goodbye, Baku
episodes.plot: Durahan sends Chariot and a pack of Salamanders to destroy the group. The Salamanders are reluctant to follow the group into the forest, because a monster is rumored to live there. Chariot orders them to kill the group, regardless of some rumor.

episodes.title: Tiger Meets His Match
episodes.plot: The team takes a break in a meadow, and Tiger goes to look for food. While he is gone, Jagd Hound attacks. Tiger chases him, because Jagd Hound was not a Baddie. Tiger learns that Lilim kidnapped a baby Jagd Hound swore to protect, and the only way Jagd Hound would get it back was if he destroyed Genki's group...

episodes.title: Renocraft, Slayer in the Sand
episodes.plot: Durahan sends Renocraft to destroy the group, but they succeed in turning him into a lost disc.

episodes.title: Magic Stone Mayhem
episodes.plot: Captain Weed realizes that the Magic Stone is needed to perfect his body. He tells Durahan to get it. Durahan wants it for himself to overthrow Moo. Durahan sends the Gangsters, which are self-reassembling robots. Lilim gets the Magic Stone before Weed does, and goes to give it to Durahan.

episodes.title: The End of Durahan
episodes.plot: When Lilim returns, she tells Durahan that she would rather give the Magic Stone to Moo. All of Durahan's forces have turned on him, and to make matters worse, Genki and his friends teleport to Durahan's warship. Lilim rigs it to explode, and she gets away with the Magic Stone. Genki and his friends confront Durahan and defeat him.

episodes.title: Jill's Icy Secret
episodes.plot: The group travels north, and comes across a village of Jill. Jill tells them of the legend of Cinderbird, who changed the evil Skullcapt into a regular Jill. Jill decides that Genki and his friends have true souls of goodness, and decide to show them the Phoenix, which is encased in a giant ice cube. But Moo comes, fully reenergized. Genki and the others attempt to lead Moo away from the Phoenix.

episodes.title: Tears
episodes.plot: Genki and the others attempt to lead Moo away from the Phoenix. But Pixie is seriously hurt while fighting. But instead of finishing them off, Moo goes berserk. His mind is strangled by the evil fury of Moo's soul. Meanwhile, Pixie is in danger of becoming a lost disc. Big Blue decides to fuse with Pixie to save her, even though he ceases to exist...

episodes.title: Blue Skies
episodes.plot: The berserk Moo travels to Mt. Kyrus to destroy the volcano. The magma, Monol tells them, will cause a chain reaction inside the planet and cause a catastrophic earthquake that will destroy the planet. Monol also says the only way to stop him is with Phoenix's soul, and that it was split into five mystery discs. And those mystery discs are Suezo, Mocchi, Tiger, Golem, and Hare...

episodes.title: In the Beginning
episodes.plot: Genkiis a young boy with an ordinary, dull life. That is, until he gets a new game in the mail. He soon gets pulled in and must now fend for himself within the game. He soon comes across two friends,SuezoandHolly. But, will they be able to stop the terrible monster,Moo?

episodes.title: I'm Mocchi!
episodes.plot: Genki, Mocchi, Holly, and Suezo continue on their trek. Genki is concerned, however, that Mocchi is becoming a softy, so he decides to leave him with an elderly couple they meet outside of a town. Genki wants Mocchi to stay with them, but Mocchi refuses and shows his friendship toward Genki by helping him defeat the Black Dinos.

episodes.title: Guardian of the Disks
episodes.plot: Genki and friends come across an "enigma", a Golem that does not like to fight. They invite him to join their quest, but when Moo's troops threaten the Golem's "Garden of Lost Disks", they discover a terrible secret about him!

episodes.title: Eternal Worm
episodes.plot: Genki and his friends encounter Alan, a young boy who is strict and cruel to his pet Worm. When he tries to ally with agents of Moo, however, he learns that loyalty is something that is given and not taken.

episodes.title: Tiger of the Wind
episodes.plot: Genki and his friends come across a group of bandits in the desert, led by Tiger of the Wind. He steals the Magic Stone, but the Baddies turn all of his friends into Mystery Disks and injure him. When Genki and his friends save him, he helps them defeat Captain Dino and then joins them.

episodes.title: Hare's Trick
episodes.plot: Genki and his friends reach a town with a giant coliseum! Tiger battles Hare, who cheats his way to a victory. Genki and the others soon forgive him and Hare offers to buy them dinner and a place to stay the night. In the morning, Hare runs off and leaves them the bill, but Tiger catches up and makes him pay. Hare apologizes, and joins the group.

episodes.title: The Courageous Seven
episodes.plot: Continuing on their journey, Genki and the others arrive at a village close to a dam. With evil Hares attacking the dam, can Genki and friends stop Moo's minions before they flood the village below?

episodes.title: After the Rain
episodes.plot: Stuck under a bridge while waiting out a heavy rainstorm, Holly tells the others of her past.

episodes.title: The Iron Bird
episodes.plot: Arriving at what seems to be a bottomless pit called "Heaven Canyon", Genki and the others meet Ed, the pilot of the "Iron Bird" flying machine.

episodes.title: The Ruins' Secret
episodes.plot: Continuing their journey in the "Iron Bird", Genki and the others arrive on the other side of "Heaven's Canyon" only to soon after encounter baddie Pixie and her minions.

episodes.title: Pixie's Defeat
episodes.plot: Genki and Mocchi must try to save Holly and the others from Pixie's enslavement, leading to a battle between Genki's team and Pixie's.

episodes.title: Monol's Story
episodes.plot: Genki and the gang discover a Mystery Disc that unlocks a Monol. Monol proceeds to tell a story of the past; the creation of Moo and his defeat.

episodes.title: Moo Revealed
episodes.plot: Before the gang can start a search for another Mystery Disk, Suezo sees Moo's castle off in the distance. Shortly after, they have their first confrontation with Moo which results in Holly's abduction.

episodes.title: Holly's Rescue
episodes.plot: With the help of Vulcan and the Pirate Dragons, Genki and the gang head toward Moo's Castle to attempt to save Holly. Meanwhile, Moo tries to convince Holly that he is her father.

episodes.title: A New Departure
episodes.plot: Holly's Magic Stone points Genki and the others across ocean. When looking for a ship to cross it, they encounter baddie Gali's Zuum troops and Horn the Righteous Pirate.

episodes.title: Great Battle at Sea
episodes.plot: Aboard Horn's ship, our heroes travel across the ocean, much to Golem's dismay. Soon after, they are attacked by more of Moo's baddies, the Zillas and their leader, Guji.

episodes.title: Underground Adventure
episodes.plot: Now back on land, the gang continue their search for The Phoenix. At Hare's urging, Genki and company enter a cave they think to be a shortcut. Meanwhile, Tiger and Hare's rivalry reaches a boil, and Joker, one of Gali's minions shows up.

episodes.title: Our Friend Henger Forever
episodes.plot: Continuing on their journey, Genki and the others find parts to a Henger and discover a seemingly abandoned city.

episodes.title: Suezo's Secret Weapon
episodes.plot: Suezo has always been happy to let others do the fighting for him. But, his friends have begun to take him for granted, and when Hare points out that he has no Special Attack, Suezo takes the criticism pretty hard. Genki begins to try and train him, but does Suezo have the courage it takes to show what he can really do?

episodes.title: My Name Is Pixie
episodes.plot: Pixie returns, and helps Genki in a battle against a group of Scale Jells. But she and Genki become separated from the others, and when Pixie gets injured, she finds she must rely on Genki to survive. At first, she is embarrassed and angry. But Genki's compassion begins to wear away at the barrier of hatred she has built around herself.

episodes.title: The Mocchi Cannon
episodes.plot: The Searchers finally confront Gali, the second of Moo's Big Four. Gali is both charming and clever, and manages to trap Genki and the others in a pit. But Mocchi escapes the trap, and the young monster must fight, alone, in order to save his friends.

episodes.title: Run, Tiger, Run!
episodes.plot: The Searchers are attacked by the Black Worms, who are under Gray Wolf's command. Tiger must save the group and come over the realization that he must be the one to defeat his brother.

episodes.title: Don't Give Up, Ducken!
episodes.plot: While wandering through a hude, dark forest, the Searchers are captured by a group of Moks, led by their captain, a dark Mok named Ebony. Mocchi manages to escape, and befriends a Ducken, who had been hiding in the forest from the Moks. Can Mocchi save Genki and the others or will his efforts get his new friend captured as well?

episodes.title: Undine's Lake
episodes.plot: The Searchers come across a small, quiet lake in the forest. They decide to restock their food supplies with fish. However, the lake has another inhabitant, an Undine. Golem falls in love with the beautiful water spirit, but she turns out to be a servant of Moo. Will he be able to defeat her?

episodes.title: Warriors of the Ruins
episodes.plot: When Genki and his friends are chased into an Arena by an army of Salamanders, they are challenged to three separate duels by the powerful Warriors Celius, Dragoon and Centaur, who all have strength to match that of Grey Wolf. If they win two of their battles they will be granted passage forwards, but if they lose two of their battles then they will be handed over to Moo.

episodes.title: Melcarba
episodes.plot: While running from a squad of creatures called JaggerNauts, Genki and the others stumble across a factory. However, an android, Melcarba, is still lying dormant in the factory for millions of years and kills all of the JaggerNauts. Then it turns on the Searchers, and they have to use the lightning storm to shut down the derranged cyborg.
